column5: Situation

column5: A cult is performing a ritual that must be stopped

column3: Grown from a great tree -  it is alive

column6: The solution is known but morally questionable

column5: A magical power source is overloaded or failing/experiment gone wrong

column7: A priest whose god has gone silent—or too loud

column5: Is under seige
column6: The location itself is sentient and afraid

column6: The problem is a symptom of something much larger

column5: People are going missing

column5: A prophecy or omen is rapidly coming true

column5: The home of a warlord terrorising the surrounding countryside.  Exacting heavy tolls on all and those who cant pay are turned into slaves.
column7: A big always hungry simple super happy barbarian named Steve.  Sounds like Schwarzenegger.  Solution is always "do you want me to kill them?"

column5: An old god is weak because it does not have enough worshippers.  It asks for help in finding new worshippers in exchange for power (take a level in paladin or cleric for free?)

A devil/demon has been summoned.  it may be willing to make a deal.
A devil offers you a bargain. Can max one stat to 20 but have to drop another to 3. You choose the 20, DM chooses the 3z. Do you accept?
